}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Broadcom]] BCM43224 single chip + 802.11n combo card :802.11a/b/g/n (2x2) WLAN + Bluetooth
This is the wireless card for the Apple MacBook model A1342 *Apple MacBook 13.3" 2.26GHz Core 2 Duo (A1342) - Late 2009 *Apple MacBook 13.3" 2.4GHz Core 2 Duo (A1342) - Mid 2010
*Apple Mac Mini (A1347) BCM43224 + BCM2070 (BT 3.0) [http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/2192/apple-mac-mini-a1347-computer-teardown TD] :Broadcom BCM943224PCIEBT 802.11abgn (2x2) BT 2.1+EDR
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:BCM943224PCIEBT.jpg|BCM943224PCIEBT </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
